name: KATIL KAZAN
tag_list: trafik, internet-trafii, hit, tatil, bedava, bedava-tatil, tikla, tikla-kazan, kazan, katil, katil-kazan, fatbat, fatbat-productions, bele, chat, oyun, video, elence, arkada, cretsiz, reklam, scuba, diving, balk, adam, kadn, balk-adam, balk-kadn, cmas, ja
overview:
KATIL KAZAN LTD.

Katilkazan ltd. created couple of web based project since february of 2009. The company is in online gaming and advertising. One of ads project is www.katilkazan.com.tr which created at 2009,February. This website runs on one idea to it’s members ” CLICK&WIN” . Katilkazan LTD. has a trademark of it and fights with phissing web sites which is offers members big lies just for maillists.

www.katilkazan.com.tr is an advertising game, members signing up for free and clicks on to advertisement which is designed by KATILKAZAN LTD. ‘s graphic designers. Members collecting points from all ads and all the activity shown up in website gives them more points. In every ten days one of highscorer goes to a dream holiday in Turkey right now. The Competition will be giving much more precious gifts in time.

www.katilkazan.com.tr - satisfy it’s costumers in two ways.

Traffic Sending - members of site clicks around 6 times a day to an ad. If member would like to gain multiple points from the ad he/she has to click the websites link!. So 6 times a day in several I.P ‘s members visits the Advertise owners website. It could help the website owner to increase their traffic.

It also gives people the surfing joy. Many of Turkish Internet users still don’t know anything about internet.

Advertising - Just think about you’re clicking at least 6 times to same advertisement.

This is the www.katilkazan.com.tr ‘s advertisiment differencies from other web based advertisements.
